Hi Karl,

Thank you for your patience!

The engineering team was able to reproduce this scenario on our side. The issue is in the Alert creation , "Check all" checkbox in the Administrator section.
A task was created for the fix, but we don't have an ETA yet.
As a workaround , please edit the Alerts , uncheck all Administrators and Save the Alert without any Administrators. Edit again and manually check each Administrator that needs to receive the Alert without using the "Check all" checkbox.

Please let me know if the workaround works until the fix is implemented.

Best regards,
